tasks.task: MAINTASK: Set up and maintain an aquaponics system for organic food production.
subtasks: Research and prepare materials including fish tanks, hydroponic beds, pumps, filtration systems, and suitable plant and fish species.
Assemble the aquaponic system by constructing tanks, installing beds, and setting up water circulation and filtration components.
Initialize the system by introducing fish and planting seedlings, ensuring proper stocking levels and compatibility between species.
Develop and adhere to a maintenance schedule involving daily tasks such as feeding, monitoring water quality, and adjusting system parameters as needed.
Regularly inspect plants and fish for signs of stress or disease, implementing corrective actions such as adjusting nutrition or treating illnesses.
Harvest produce as the system stabilizes, periodically replacing plants and managing growth to optimize space and resources.
